original_text: The Lord your God promised your ancestors to give you more land to live in. When all that land belongs to you, 9 you must continue to obey all the commands that I am giving you today. You must continue to love the Lord your God and live in a way that pleases him. Then, when your land becomes bigger, you must choose three more cities to be safe cities.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 대로 네 지경을 넓혀 네 조상들에게 주리라고 말씀하신 땅을 다 네게 주실 때

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God promised your ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너희 하나님이 너희 조상들에게 약속하셨으니

sentences.original_text: to give you more land to live in
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 살 더 많은 땅을 주시리라

sentences.original_text: When all that land belongs to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 땅이 너희의 소유가 될 때에

sentences.original_text: you must continue to obey all the commands
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 모든 명령을 계속 순종해야 하며

sentences.original_text: that I am giving you today
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 오늘 너희에게 주는 이 모든 명령을

sentences.original_text: You must continue to love the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 계속 주 너희 하나님을 사랑해야 하고

sentences.original_text: and live in a way that pleases him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 기쁘시게 하는 삶을 살아야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: Then, when your land becomes bigger
you must choose three more cities
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 세 도시를 더 택해야 하리니
